verses.plain: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

tokens.t: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

verses.plain: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

tokens.t: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

verses.plain: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;

tokens.t: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;

verses.plain: Neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.

tokens.t: Neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.

verses.plain: For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.

tokens.t: For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.

verses.plain: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.

tokens.t: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.

verses.plain: Be not ye therefore partakers with them.

tokens.t: Be not ye therefore partakers with them.

verses.plain: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:

tokens.t: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now
light in the Lord: walk as children of light:

verses.plain: (For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)

tokens.t: (For the fruit of the Spirit
in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)

verses.plain: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.

tokens.t: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.

verses.plain: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.

tokens.t: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove

verses.plain: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.

tokens.t: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.

verses.plain: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.

tokens.t: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.

verses.plain: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.

tokens.t: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.

verses.plain: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,

tokens.t: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,

verses.plain: Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

tokens.t: Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

verses.plain: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.

tokens.t: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord

verses.plain: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

tokens.t: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

verses.plain: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

tokens.t: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

verses.plain: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;

tokens.t: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;

verses.plain: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.

tokens.t: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.

verses.plain: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.

tokens.t: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.

verses.plain: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.

tokens.t: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.

verses.plain: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing.

tokens.t: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so
the wives
to their own husbands in every thing.

verses.plain: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

tokens.t: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

verses.plain: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,

tokens.t: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,

verses.plain: That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

tokens.t: That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

verses.plain: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.

tokens.t: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.

verses.plain: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:

tokens.t: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:

verses.plain: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.

tokens.t: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.

verses.plain: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.

tokens.t: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.

verses.plain: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.

tokens.t: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.

verses.plain: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.

tokens.t: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife
that she reverence
husband.
